quest.name: Raptor 'round Your Little Finger
journal: Etgar requires your assistance with a raptor predicament.

Etgar, a local tender of Wineport's vineyards, has requested your assistance with a grass raptor problem. The scalekin have been munching on the outpost's precious vines, and they must be stopped. Track down four of the beasts and teach them a lesson.
You have shown a quartet of raptors what for, and made the vineyards safe for another day. Report your success to Etgar.
Etgar seems well pleased by your tidings, and vows to keep you in mind should he have need of your services in the future.

dialogue.name: ETGAR
dialogue.text: Hallo, adventurer! Hear me, or Master Byrglaent will know the reason why! I mean that he'll simply tell you himself if you refuse to hear it from me.

dialogue.name: ETGAR
dialogue.text: You've no doubt seen those ghastly grass raptors skulking about outside our gates. Well, they've developed a taste for the vines we use to grow our brandewine cherries, and we can't abide that. You must kill the horrible creatures!

dialogue.name: ETGAR
dialogue.text: Ah, the conquering heroinehero returns! And so quickly, too. You are as strong as you are kind, and pleasingly made about the shoulderswonderfully trim of waist. I shall make sure to keep you in mind should any future troubles creep up.

obj.n: The Things We Do for Cheese
